data.text: Yakob frɛɛ ne mmammarima nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Mommɛtwa me ho nhyia, na menka mo deɛ ɛbɛba mo so.
“Yakob mmammarima, mommoaboa mo ho ano, na montie;
“Ruben, wo na woyɛ mʼabakan.
Woyɛ kirikiri sɛ asorɔkye, nanso worenkɔ so bio,
“Simeon ne Lewi yɛ anuanom.
Mma me nkɔka wɔn agyinatuo ho,
Nnome nka wɔn abufuo, ɛfiri sɛ, ano yɛ den,
“Yuda, wo nuammarimanom bɛyi wo ayɛ.
Ao, Yuda, woyɛ gyata ba a
Ahempoma remfiri Yuda nsam,
Ɔbɛsa nʼafunumu wɔ bobe dua mu.
Nʼaniwa aba bɛbiri asene bobesa.
“Sebulon bɛtena mpoano.
“Isakar yɛ afunumu hoɔdenfoɔ a
Sɛ ɔhunu sɛdeɛ nʼahomegyebea yɛ fa a,
“Dan bɛbu ne manfoɔ atɛn
Dan bɛyɛ sɛ ɔtweaseɛ a ɔda kwankyɛn;
“Ao, Awurade, wo nkwagyeɛ na meretwɛn.
“Nnipa bɔnefoɔ bɛto ahyɛ Gad so,
“Aser aduane a ɔdi no bɛyɛ aduane pa.
“Naftali te sɛ ɔforoteɛ a wɔagyaa no a
“Yosef yɛ ngo dua a ɛso aba,
Agyantofoɔ kaa no hyɛeɛ,
Nanso, ne bɛma no gyinaa pintinn,
esiane Onyankopɔn a wʼagya somm no a ɔboa wo no;
Wʼagya nhyira a wɔahyira no no
“Benyamin yɛ pataku a ɔyɛ nam;
Yei ne nhyira a Israel mmusuakuo dumienu no agya de hyiraa wɔn; obiara ne sɛdeɛ ɛfata no.
Yakob rebɛwuo no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn hyɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Aka kakraa bi, na wɔrebɛfa me akɔka me mpanimfoɔ ho. Sɛ mewu a, monsie me wɔ ɔboda a ɛwɔ Hetini Efron afuo a wɔsiee me mpanimfoɔ mu no mu.
Ɛno ne ɔboda ne afuo a ɛwɔ Makpela, a ɛbɛn Mamrɛ a ɛwɔ Kanaan asase so no. Abraham tɔɔ saa ɔboda no firii Hetini Efron nkyɛn, de yɛɛ amusieeɛ.
Saa ɔboda no mu na wɔsiee Abraham ne ne yere Sara. Ɛhɔ ara nso na wɔsiee Isak ne ne yere Rebeka, na mesiee Lea nso.
Me nana Abraham tɔɔ afuo no ne ɔboda a ɛka ho no nyinaa firii Hetifoɔ no nkyɛn.”
Ɛberɛ a Yakob kasa kyerɛɛ ne mma no wieeɛ no, ɔmaa ne nan so guu ne mpa so wuiɛ. Wɔkɔsiee no wɔ ne mpanimfoɔ nkyɛn.
